external_games.name: Gear Club Unlimited 2 - Tracks Edition (NSW) - Nintendo Switch
Gear Club Unlimited 2: Tracks Edition (Nintendo Switch)

name: Gear.Club Unlimited 2: Tracks Edition
summary: Gear.Club Unlimited 2 - Tracks Edition is a racing game with a focus on technical elements such as pit stops, tyre and fuel management, and race strategy. A brand new campaign is added with new tracks and new cars.
